verses.verse: In <WG1722> Year <WG2094> Now The <WG1161> Fifteenth <WG4003> Of The <WG3588> Government <WG2231> Of Tiberius <WG5086> Caesar, <WG2541> Being Governor <WG2230> Pontius <WG4194> Pilate <WG4091> <WG3588> Of Judea, <WG2449> And <WG2532> Being Tetrarch <WG5075> <WG3588> Of Galilee <WG1056> Herod, <WG2264> <WG5376> And Philip <WG1161> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother <WG846>, Being Tetrarch <WG5075> <WG3588> Of Ituraea <WG2484> And <WG2532> Of Trachonitis The <WG5139> Region, <WG5561> And <WG2532> Lysanias <WG3078> <WG3588> Of Abilene <WG9> Being Tetrarch, <WG5075>

' In The <WG1909> High Priesthood <WG749> Of Annas <WG452> And <WG2532> Caiaphas, <WG2533> Came The <WG1096> Word <WG4487> Of God <WG2316> Upon <WG1909> John <WG2491> The <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Zacharias <WG2197> Son <WG5207> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Wilderness. <WG2048>

And <WG2532> He Went <WG2064> Into <WG1519> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Country Around <WG4066> The <WG3588> Jordan, <WG2446> Proclaiming The <WG2784> Baptism <WG908> Of Repentance <WG3341> For <WG1519> Remission <WG859> Of Sins; <WG266>

As <WG5613> It Has Been Written <WG1125> In The <WG1722> Book <WG976> Of The Words <WG3056> Of Isaiah <WG2268> The <WG3588> Prophet, <WG4396>, Saying, <WG3004> The Voice <WG5456> Of One Crying <WG994> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Wilderness, <WG2048> Prepare <WG2090> The <WG3588> Way <WG3598> Of The Lord; <WG2962> Straight <WG2117> Make <WG4160> <WG3588> Paths <WG5147> His. <WG846>

Every <WG3956> Ravine <WG5327> Shall Be Filled Up, <WG4137> And <WG2532> Every <WG3956> Mountain <WG3735> And <WG2532> Hill <WG1015> Shall Be Made Low; <WG5013> And <WG2532> Shall Become <WG2071> The <WG3588> Crooked Places <WG4646> Into <WG1519> A Straight Path, <WG2117> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Rough <WG5138> Into <WG1519> Ways <WG3598> Smooth; <WG3006>
And <WG2532> Shall See <WG3700> All <WG3956> Flesh <WG4561> The <WG3588> Salvation <WG4992> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

He Said <WG3004> Therefore <WG3767> To The <WG3588> Coming Out <WG1607> Crowds <WG3793> To Be Baptized <WG907> ' By <WG5259> Him, <WG846> Offspring <WG1081> Of Vipers, <WG2191> Who <WG5101> Forewarned <WG5263> You <WG5213> To Flee <WG5343> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Coming <WG3195> Wrath? <WG3709>

Produce <WG4160> Therefore <WG3767> Fruits <WG2590> Worthy <WG514> <WG3588> Of Repentance; <WG3341> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Begin <WG756> To Say <WG3004> In <WG1722> Yourselves, <WG1438> For Father <WG3962> We Have <WG2192> <WG3588> Abraham, <WG11> <WG3004> For I Say <WG1063> To You, <WG5213> That <WG3754> Is Able <WG1410> <WG3588> God <WG2316> From <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG3037> These Stones <WG5130> To Raise Up <WG1453> Children <WG5043> <WG3588> To Abraham. <WG11>

<WG2235> But Already <WG1161> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Axe <WG513> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Root <WG4491> Of The <WG3588> Trees <WG1186> Is Applied : <WG2749> Every <WG3956> Therefore <WG3767> Tree <WG1186> Not <WG3361> Producing <WG4160> Fruit <WG2590> Good <WG2570> Is Cut Down <WG1581> And <WG2532> Into The <WG1519> Fire <WG4442> Is Cast. <WG906>
And <WG2532> Asked <WG1905> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Crowds, <WG3793> Saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> Then <WG3767> Shall We Do? <WG4160>

<WG611> And Answering <WG1161> He Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> He That <WG3588> Has <WG2192> Two <WG1417> Tunics <WG5509> Let Him Impart <WG3330> <WG3588> To Him That <WG3361> Has Not; <WG2192> And <WG2532> He That <WG3588> Has <WG2192> Victuals <WG1033> Likewise <WG3668> Let Him Do. <WG4160>
<WG2064> And Came <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Tax Gatherers <WG5057> To Be Baptized, <WG907> And <WG2532> They Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Him, <WG846> Teacher, <WG1320> What <WG5101> Shall We Do? <WG4160>
<WG3588> And He <WG1161> Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846> Nothing <WG3367> More <WG4119> Beyond <WG3844> That Which <WG3588> Is Appointed <WG1299> To You <WG5213> Exact. <WG4238>

<WG1905> And Asked <WG1161> Him <WG846> Also <WG2532> Those Who Were Soldiers, <WG4754> Saying, <WG3004> And <WG2532> We <WG2249> What <WG5101> Shall We Do? <WG4160> And <WG2532> He Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846> No One <WG3367> Oppress <WG1286> Nor <WG3366> Accuse Falsely, <WG4811> And <WG2532> Be Satisfied <WG714> <WG3588> <WG3800> With Your Wages. <WG5216>

<WG4328> But As Were In Expectation <WG1161> The <WG3588> People, <WG2992> And <WG2532> Were Reasoning <WG1260> All <WG3956> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2588> Their Hearts <WG846> Concerning <WG4012> <WG3588> John, <WG2491> Whether Or Not <WG3379> He <WG846> Might Be <WG1498> The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547>

Answered <WG611> <WG3588> John <WG2491> All, <WG537>, Saying, <WG3004> I 1473 P-1NS Indeed 3303 PRT With Water 5204 N-DSN Baptize 907 V-PAI-1S You, 5209 P-2AP 2064 V-PNI-3S But He Comes 1161 CONJ Who Is 3588 T-NSM Mightier 2478 A-NSM-C Than I, 3450 P-1GS Of Whom 3739 R-GSM 3756 PRT-N I Am Not 1510 V-PXI-1S Fit 2425 A-NSM To Loose 3089 V-AAN The 3588 T-ASM Thong 2438 N-ASM 3588 T-GPN 5266 N-GPN Of His Sandals; 846 P-GSM He 846 P-NSM You 5209 P-2AP Will Baptize 907 V-FAI-3S With The 1722 PREP Spirit 4151 N-DSN Holy 40 A-DSN And 2532 CONJ With Fire; 4442 N-DSN

Of Whom <WG3739> The <WG3588> Winnowing Fan Is <WG4425> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG5495> His Hand, <WG846> And <WG2532> He Will Thoroughly Purge <WG1245> <WG3588> <WG257> His Floor, <WG846> And <WG2532> Will Gather <WG4863> The <WG3588> Wheat <WG4621> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG596> His Granary, <WG846> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Chaff <WG892> He Will Burn <WG2618> With Fire <WG4442> Unquenchable. <WG762>
<WG4183> Many <WG3303> Therefore <WG3767> And <WG2532> Other Things <WG2087> Exhorting <WG3870> He Announced The Glad Tidings <WG2097> To The <WG3588> People. <WG2992>

<WG3588> But <WG1161> Herod <WG2264> The <WG3588>, Tetrarch <WG5076> Being Reproved <WG1651> ' By <WG5259> Him <WG846> Concerning <WG4012> Herodias <WG2266> The <WG3588> Wife <WG1135> Of Philip <WG5376> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother, <WG846> And <WG2532> Concerning <WG4012> All <WG3956> Which <WG3739> Had Done The <WG4160> Evils <WG4190> <WG3588> Herod, <WG2264>
Added <WG4369> Also <WG2532> This <WG5124> To <WG1909> All <WG3956> That <WG2532> He Shut Up <WG2623> <WG3588> John <WG2491> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Prison. <WG5438>

<WG1096> <WG1161> Now It Came To Pass <WG1722> <WG3588> Having Been Baptized <WG907> All <WG537> The <WG3588> People, <WG2992> And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> Having Been Baptized <WG907> And <WG2532> Praying, <WG4336> Was Opened <WG455> The <WG3588> Heaven, <WG3772>

And <WG2532> Descended <WG2597> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> The <WG3588> Holy <WG40> In A Bodily <WG4984> Form <WG1491> As <WG5616> A Dove <WG4058> ' Upon <WG1909> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> A Voice <WG5456> Out Of <WG1537> Heaven <WG3772> Came, <WG1096>, Saying, <WG3004> Thou <WG4771> Art <WG1488> <WG3588> <WG5207> My Son <WG3450> The <WG3588> Beloved, <WG27> In <WG1722> Thee <WG4671> I Have Found Delight. <WG2106>
